ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
NOT( OR( ISBLANK(Phone),
AND( BEGINS(Phone, "+"), NOT(BEGINS(Phone, "+0")), REGEX(Phone, "^\\+?[1-9]{1}[0-9]*$") ),
AND( OR( BEGINS(Phone, "080"), BEGINS(Phone, "090") ), OR( LEN(Phone) = 8, LEN(Phone) = 11 ), NOT(LEN(Phone) = 10) ),
AND( BEGINS(Phone, "044"), LEN(Phone) >= 6, LEN(Phone) <= 14 ),
AND( BEGINS(Phone, "0"), NOT( OR( BEGINS(Phone, "080"), BEGINS(Phone, "090"), BEGINS(Phone, "044") ) ), LEN(Phone) = 10 ),
AND( BEGINS(Phone, "1"), OR( LEN(Phone) = 3, LEN(Phone) = 4, LEN(Phone) = 5, LEN(Phone) = 6 ) ),
REGEX(Phone, "^[2-9]{1}[0-9]{2}[\\s.-]?[0-9]{3}[\\s.-]?[0-9]{4}$") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Check if the phone number is in correct order.
